location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 41 of 1869 from Lewis Pelly, Political Resident, Persian Gulf to an undisclosed recipient

mods.abstract: Letter from Pelly instructing that the papers which accompanied letter No. 41 of 1869 should be circulated to the Assistant Residents, Dr Hojel, the officers of the Army vessels attached to the Residency and to Captain South.The letter also includes the initials of the various individuals who read the papers and the date they did so.
